casebody.data:
SHEPARD
v.
OCWEN FEDERAL BANK, et al. No. 476A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 12, 2005. Mallam J. Maynard, Maria D. McIntyre, Charlotte, Chandra T. Taylor, J. Jerome Hartzell, Raleigh, for Wayne & Rosemary Shepard. William Walt Pettit, Matthew T. McKee, for Ocwen Federal Bank, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of October 2005 by NC Justice Center, et al for leave to file Amici Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amici Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of October 2005."
